faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Answers to the most common questions about our platform
faq.what_is: What is Sanaie and how does it work?
faq.what_is_answer: Sanaie is a local services marketplace that connects customers with verified service providers. Search by category or use the request page to get quotes, then book and pay securely through the platform.
faq.find_book: How do I find and book a service?
faq.find_book_answer: Browse categories or use the search bar to find services. Open a provider's profile to view ratings, past work, and prices, then choose a time and confirm the booking from the service page.
faq.providers_verified_answer: Providers go through identity and document verification before offering services. We also collect customer reviews and ratings to maintain quality and trust on the platform.
faq.payments_answer: We support secure online payments (credit/debit cards and local wallets) and may offer cash-on-delivery where applicable. All card payments are processed over encrypted connections.
faq.cancellation: What is the cancellation and refund policy?
faq.cancellation_answer: When you cancel an order, you can get a refund and keep it as credit in the app.
faq.become_provider: How can I become a service provider on Sanaie?
faq.become_provider_answer: Sign up as a provider from the 'Join as Service Provider' link, submit required documents, and complete the onboarding steps. Once verified, you can publish services and receive bookings.
faq.advertise: How do I advertise or promote my service on the site?
faq.advertise_answer: Advertisers can create promotional ads via the Ads section. Contact our sales team or use the dashboard (if available) to set up campaigns and target your audience.
faq.availability: Is Sanaie available in my city?
faq.availability_answer: Sanaie currently operates in major cities across Egypt. If your city isn't listed, submit a request through the contact form and we'll consider expanding coverage.
faq.support: How can I contact customer support?
faq.support_answer: Use the support/contact page, email us, or call the helpline listed in the footer. Provide booking or account details so we can help quickly.

mobile.download_sub: Get instant access to trusted service providers right from your phone. Book services, track orders, and manage your account on the go.
